wikipedia_page.main: Paul Shields (born  (1978-09-25) 25 September 1978) is an Irish professional rugby union footballer of the 2000s. He played at club level for Ulster Rugby and Northampton Saints, as a Hooker. He won two caps for the Ireland national team in 2003.

response: Paul Shields is the name of:
* Paul Shields (American football) (born 1976), American football player
* Paul Shields (rugby union) (born 1978), Irish rugby union footballer
* Paul Shields (actor), actor in the film Lansdown
